scripts.// --- Local Execution ---: Run tests directly on your machine
scripts.test:qa: npm run allure:clear && npm run allure:env && cypress run --env envName=qa,allure=true
scripts.test:prod: npm run allure:clear && npm run allure:env && cypress run --env envName=prod,allure=true
scripts.docker:run:qa: npm run docker:clean && docker run --name rydoo-container -e envName=qa rydoo-automation
scripts.docker:run:prod: npm run docker:clean && docker run --name rydoo-container -e envName=prod rydoo-automation
scripts.// --- Full Pipeline Simulation (Local): One command to rule them all
scripts.allure:report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.full:qa: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:qa && npm run docker:export && npm run allure:report
scripts.full:prod: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:prod && npm run docker:export && npm run allure:report
